name: Artillery Barrage
description: Place one Call-in marker. Materializes on a 4+. When it materializes each unit within D6+6" of the marker is targeted by 1 Blast(2D3+1) shot that always scores a direct hit on 6+ regardless of modifiers. Don't roll for partial hits. All units take D3 Pins instead of the normal single pin regardless of if they were hit directly or not. Armoured units count as being hit in the Rear facing.

name: Rocket Barrage
description: Place one Call-in marker. Materializes on a 4+. When it materializes each unit within 2D6+6" of the marker is targeted by 1 Blast(2D3) shot that always scores a direct hit on 6+ regardless of modifiers. Don't roll for partial hits. All units take D3 Pins instead of the normal single pin regardless of if they were hit directly or not. Armoured units count as being hit in the Rear facing.

name: Incendiary Barrage
description: Place one Call-in marker. Materializes on a 4+. When it materializes each unit within 6" takes a number of Pen '-' hits equal to the number of models it has within 6" (Team(X) models within 6" takes hits equal to its remaining Wound capacity instead of just one) and a Pin marker. After it materializes the first time the Call-in marker is not removed but may no longer be moved. At the end of the turn after it materialized roll a die, on 4+ any unit within 6" takes hits in the same way again and on less than 4 the marker is removed.

name: Anti-infantry Strafe
description: Place 2 Call-in markers at most 18" away from each other. Materializes on 4+. When it materializes any unit within 3" of the line drawn between the markers are targeted by 3 Blast(D3) shot that always scores a direct hit on 6+ regardless of modifiers. Don't roll for partial hits. All units take D3 Pins instead of the normal single pin regardless of if they were hit directly or not. Armoured units count as being hit in the Rear facing. Non-Open-Topped Armoured Vehicles that cannot be damaged by Blast(D3) does not take any Pins.
